name: Late Night Gaming - (Prototype)
description:
"A short proof of concept of a remix using gameplay mechanics from classic survival horror games and first person atmospheric horror titles, switching between characters and realities."

In "Late Night Gaming" you play as a college student that deprived of sleep due to excitement for it's new favourite videogame "Horror Survivor 3" starts playing it nonstop at 3 AM.

In this late night session they will end up mistaking what's actually real with that comes from the fiction they've been binge-playing.

This single person project was developed during a few weeks total using Unreal Engine 5.

Game Design, Level Design, Scripting and Sound Design: Adrian Iglesias Adrover (Linkedin)

Sketchfab Models Used:

Main Character Girl- @bronwenalexina - Rigged with Mixamo

Students Room- Qifan Zhang - Manipulated using Blender

Outdoors Foliage and Dressing - Quaternius Stylized Nature Pack
